name: Jernej Barbic
content: Jernej Barbic Professor of computer science, University of Southern California, Los Angeles, USA. Research interests: computer graphics, animation, interactive physics, FEM, model reduction, deformable models, anatomically based modeling, medical imaging, haptics. Hand MRI dataset Author of Co-founder and CTO of acquired by Unity Technologies. Students: •   Jiahao Wen, PhD cand. •   Huanyu Chen, PhD cand. •   Zhiyuan Gao, PhD cand. •   Past students Teaching: Spring 2025: CS-520 Computer Animation and Simulation Spring 2025: CS-420 Computer Graphics Spring 2024: CS-520 Computer Animation and Simulation Spring 2024: CS-420 Computer Graphics Spring 2023: CS-520 Computer Animation and Simulation Spring 2023: CS-420 Computer Graphics Spring 2022: CS-520 Computer Animation and Simulation Spring 2022: CS-420 Computer Graphics Older classes Awards: Academy Award for Scientific and Technical Achievement, 2025 ACM Distinguished Member, 2020 Infinity Festival Monolith Award for Technology, 2019 USC Stevens Commercialization Award, 2017 Sloan Fellowship, 2014 Okawa Foundation Research Grant, 2014 MIT Technology Review, 35 Innovators Under 35 (in the world), 2011 NSF CAREER Award Viterbi Early Career Chair, USC Film credits: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (2013). Publications: Zhiyuan Gao, Jiageng Mao, Hong-Xing Yu, Haozhe Lou, Emily Yue-ting Jia, Jernej Barbič, Jiajun Wu, Yue Wang: Seeing the Wind from a Falling Leaf, Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS) 2025 Gao and Mao contributed equally, and should be considered equal first authors.
